post.body: it will be great to see the photos tomorrow - it's late - you should go to bed!!
... you are so thoughtful ... wish they still have that sushi making kit. I should have bought it when I saw it!
looks like you had a good trip to IKEA today. been wondering what they've got on sale - was the sushi set in the as-is room ??
- Happy birthday... enjoy your dinner. How was the movie ?
- I'd love to see the toy trains - but got a 404 on your link ...
nice to see you on twitter!!
so sorry you have to have surgery - hope everything will be ok .. and that it is not bc related
has a great holiday giveaway comment here http://tinyurl.com/5bd4om to enter
Congratulations on the great results from your biopsy!!! I hope your body will start cooperating quickly!
- your DH actually probably bought the wii for himself - your son is the pretense ... (lol)
poor Zulu (and you and your wife) - Zulu misses the hotel!! I hope that Zulu will adjust quickly and stop howling!
baking bread so I've got bread for a panini tomorrow... yumm!!
doing laundry and wrapping Christmas gifts! Getting ready for the holidays ... lots to do!!
I'm hoping the storm will pass through quickly and not dump a bunch more snow. Already have a foot of snow on the ground. Don't need more
it's snowing again in Northern California - I just filled up the wood box so I can easily access wood for the fire.
RT @GemAffair: Win a free Diamond Xmas Pendant. Lucky Retweeters 25,50,75,100 wins!
snowed in - have over 1 foot of snow outside - good thing I work from home!
doing some online shopping for christmas gifts
making chicken curry and rice for dinner - it smells wonderful!
RT @PaniniKathy Enter to win a Breville Indoor BBQ & Grill at Panini Happy! http://tinyurl.com/58pluu
